name: Security
des: Each of our residential projects is provided with the highest level of security facilities. It includes access control for apartments, security guards, systematic camera monitoring etc.

name: Swimming
des: Our residential projects are serviced so that the owners are free from swimming.

name: Parking
des: Convenient parking facilities are available in our residential projects to park all vehicles.

name: GYM
des: Our residential projects offer full facilities with recommended gym facilities for every owner.

name: Community Spaces
des: Various community spaces are available in our residential projects, such as natural parks, sunset decks, barbecue areas.
